title: Wild Fascination
description: A woman from Peter's past is back to stir up trouble, so Ryan and Ty take their wife to Earth for a quick holiday.When Mikayla learns of the legal action against Peter, she insists on standing beside her man. Trouble is, that's exactly where Peter's ex-fianc√©e wants her.Meanwhile, Lachlan, Brock, John, Matt, and Bryce are setting up the research base on a new, uninhabited planet. But there's something strange about this place, and it only gets worse when Mikayla arrives. Can they identify the source of the problem before their fascination becomes a danger to the woman they all love?
author: Abby Blake
